title: Jefferson Cup Stakes
text:
The Jefferson Cup Stakes is an American <a href="Thoroughbred%20horse%20race">Thoroughbred horse race</a> run in mid-June near the end of the <a href="Churchill%20Downs">Churchill Downs</a> Spring Meet in <a href="Louisville%2C%20Kentucky">Louisville, Kentucky</a>. A race on <a href="Grass">turf</a>, it is open to three-year-old <a href="race%20horse">horses</a> of either gender.
For 2010, the purse was dropped from $200,000 to $100,000 and the race was downgraded from a Grade II event at a mile and an eighth (9 furlongs) to a Grade III level at a mile and a sixteenth.
Since inception, the Jefferson Cup Stakes has been contested at various distances:
